import { useContext } from 'react' import editIcon from '../images/pensil-icon.svg' import addIcon from '../images/plus-icon.svg' import Card from './Card.js' import CurrentUserContext from '../contexts.js/CurrentUserContext' import Footer from './Footer' export default function Main(props) { const { onEditProfile, onAddPlace, onEditAvatar, onCardClick, onRemoveClick, cards, onCardLike, } = props const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUserContext) return ( <>

{currentUser.name}

{currentUser.about}

{cards.map((card) => { return ( ) })}
) }
